official_title: Accelerating Colorectal Cancer Screening Through Implementation Science in Appalachia (ACCSIS)
inclusion_criteria:
* age 50-74
* all races, sexes and genders
* resident of the study area
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 74 Years
exclusion_criteria: .no exclusions based on gender, race or ethnicity
